course.subject: FINA
course.name: Fixed Income Securities
course.description: Pricing of bonds, term structure models, duration analysis and immunization techniques, valuation of interest rate options, convertible bonds, mortgage-backed securities, pricing credit derivatives, bond portfolio construction and management.
course.prerequisites: FINA 3104 and FINA 3204

reviews.author: mkb
reviews.title: A fruitful course especially if you are interested in fixed income
reviews.comment_content:
Bond pricing
Risk Metrics (duration, convexity)
Yield Curve
FRN
Curve Strat (Steepener/ Flattener, Butterfly Curvature)
Swaps
Credit Derivatives (CDS, Par/par asset swap, Total Return Swap)
Interest Rate Future (Fed Fund Future, Eurodollar Future etc)
Bond Market (Government bond TIPS/I-bond, Asia market, green bond)
reviews.comment_teaching:
Nice professor
Able to explain difficult concepts but sometimes feel like she did not prepare enough, often involve long thinking in lesson
reviews.comment_grading:
I scored full mark in all quizes + midterms, nearly full mark in assignments
Final Score is unknown
reviews.comment_workload:
The course comprises 9 canvas quizes, but non timed
Midterm and Final no cheatsheet but formula sheet given
Find good partners for the green bond project since the project requires in-depth analysis, each of groupmate should all contribute a lot
